heading: Frequently Asked Questions
questions1: What type of transportation services do you offer?
response1: We offer a wide range of transportation services, including airport transfer, shuttle service, private car service, VIP and luxury transportation, and sightseeing tours.
questions2: Do you offer transportation services to other destinations besides Punta Cana?
response2: Yes, we offer transportation services to all destinations in the Dominican Republic, such as Santo Domingo, Puerto Plata, Samana, La Romana, Santiago, etc.
questions3: What type of vehicles do you use for transportation?
response3: We use a variety of well-maintained vehicles, including sedans, SUVs, vans, and buses,  depending on the size of your group and the type of service you choose.
questions4: Do you offer child seats or booster seats for children?
response4: Yes, we offer child seats and booster seats for children upon request at no additional charge.
response5: We understand that plans can change, which is why we offer a flexible cancellation policy. If you cancel your booking more than 24 hours before the start of your journey, you will receive a full refund. If you cancel your booking within 15 hours of the start of your journey, you will be eligible for a refund of 60% of the total paid. Please contact us for more information on our specific policy.
questions6: Are your drivers experienced and licensed?
response6: Yes, all of our drivers are experienced, licensed, and have a good knowledge of the area. They will provide you with a safe and comfortable transportation experience.
questions7: What if my flight is early or delayed?
response7: If in case you experience any kinds of problems with your flight ternaries, you can inform us. We will try to adapt to your needs and pick you up later or before. Your driver tracks your flight and waits for you if it's delayed.
questions8: Do you have any other questions?
